params._rewardToken: Reward token address to be given to users

params._weight: Weight of the token in the pool

params._user: User's address to claim the reward

params._weights: Array of weights of the tokens in the pool

params._newWeight: New weight of the token in the pool

addPool(address).notice: Registers PRI-LP token in Weighted Farming Pool

addToken(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Registers Cover Right Token to a given pool

depositFromPolicyCenter(uint256,address,.notice: Deposit from Policy Center         No need for approval

setWeight(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Sets the weight for a given array of tokens in a given pool

updateWeight(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Updates the weight of a token in a given pool

userdoc.notice: Weighted Farming Pool         Weighted farming pool support multiple tokens to earn the same reward         Different tokens will have different weights when calculating rewards         Native token premiums will be transferred to this pool         The distribution is in the way of "farming" but with multiple tokens         Different generations of PRI-LP-1-JOE-G1
